plaintext: To register your children for emergency daycare services, you must follow one of the procedures below, depending on what type of institution they attend. Please make sure you absolutely need emergency daycare services before making a request.
Registration.html: To register your children for emergency daycare services, you must follow one of the procedures below, depending on what type of institution they attend. Please make sure you absolutely need emergency daycare services before making a request.

plaintext: Children who do not attend a recognized daycare centre may obtain a place in one for the duration of the public health emergency. You may consult the childcare establishment locator  to find the contact information for the services available in your community. Some parents have had technical difficulties with the childcare establishment locator. The problem occurs only with the Explorer Internet browser, so you need to use a different browser. Although there are other locators on the Web, please note that this is the only functioning childcare establishment locator that provides reliable information.
Children who already attend a daycare centre may continue to do so according to their regular schedule under the usual conditions.
To register your child, fill out the form (DOCX 80 Kb) (in French only).
For more information about daycare services, visit the website of the Ministère de la Famille .
Daycare centres.html:
Daycare centres

Children who do not attend a recognized daycare centre may obtain a place in one for the duration of the public health emergency. You may consult the childcare establishment locator to find the contact information for the services available in your community. Some parents have had technical difficulties with the childcare establishment locator. The problem occurs only with the Explorer Internet browser, so you need to use a different browser. Although there are other locators on the Web, please note that this is the only functioning childcare establishment locator that provides reliable information.

Children who already attend a daycare centre may continue to do so according to their regular schedule under the usual conditions.

To register your child, fill out the form (DOCX 80 Kb) (in French only).

For more information about daycare services, visit the website of the Ministère de la Famille .

plaintext: If your child attends either kindergarten or elementary school (ages 4 to 13), emergency daycare services will be available in some schools.
Additional information and registration for emergency school daycare services.
Consult the list (PDF 513 Kb) or the map of institutions that will remain open  to help you choose a facility offering emergency daycare services.
Schools.html:
Schools

If your child attends either kindergarten or elementary school (ages 4 to 13), emergency daycare services will be available in some schools.

Additional information and registration for emergency school daycare services .

Consult the list (PDF 513 Kb) or the map of institutions that will remain open to help you choose a facility offering emergency daycare services.
